mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REPORT (REPORT_ID, CONTENT, REPORT_REASON, USER_ID, BOARD_ID, CREATE_DATE ) VALUES (report_seq.NEXTVAL, #{content}, #{report_reason}, #{user_id}, #{board_id}, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT r.report_id, r.create_date, r.report_reason, reporter.user_email AS reporter_email, reported.user_email AS reported_email, b.title AS board_title FROM REPORT r JOIN USERS reporter ON r.user_id = reporter.user_id JOIN BOARD b ON r.board_id = b.board_id JOIN USERS reported ON b.user_id = reported.user_id;
